entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
